Question
========
In a game of pool, the white cue ball hits the #2 ball and stops, while the #2
ball moves away with the same velocity as the cue ball had originally. Both balls
have the same mass. The type of collision is

Answerlist
----------
* elastic
* inelastic
* completely inelastic
* any of the above, depending on the mass of the balls

Solution
========
The collision described conserves kinetic energy. Therefore, it is an elastic
collision.
